description:
Welcome to How To Create Your Resume With Microsoft Word.

This course is designed to give you an introduction to Microsoft Word 2013 basics and teach you how to use them to create and customize your own resume. Microsoft Word is a powerful tool for designing eye-popping resumes and helping you stand out from the crowd. Learning how to customize a Word document could also be an important skill that also helps you land the job you're looking for!

LEARN HOW TO:

  • CREATE RESUMES IN MULTIPLE FORMATS
  • FORMAT YOUR RESUME AND ADJUST THE LAYOUT
  • CREATE BULLETED LISTS
  • CREATE TABLES
  • APPLY NEW FEATURES OF MICROSOFT OFFICE 365
title: Create The Perfect Resume! Get Your Dream Job!
